comment:
* A property value set within the manifest. *

* The value of a property will only have a single type, as defined by * the property itself.

methods.name: public String getName()
methods.comment: * Returns the name of the property.

methods.name: public String getPackageName()
methods.comment: * Returns the name of the package where this this property was defined.

methods.name: public String getClassName()
public boolean getBoolean()
methods.comment:
* Returns the boolean value set for the property. *

If the property is not of a boolean type, returns {@code false}.

methods.name: public boolean isBoolean()
methods.comment: * Returns {@code true} if the property is a boolean type. Otherwise {@code false}.

methods.name: public float getFloat()
methods.comment:
* Returns the float value set for the property. *

If the property is not of a float type, returns {@code 0.0}.

methods.name: public boolean isFloat()
methods.comment: * Returns {@code true} if the property is a float type. Otherwise {@code false}.

methods.name: public int getInteger()
methods.comment:
* Returns the integer value set for the property. *

If the property is not of an integer type, returns {@code 0}.

methods.name: public boolean isInteger()
methods.comment: * Returns {@code true} if the property is an integer type. Otherwise {@code false}.

methods.name: public int getResourceId()
methods.comment:
* Returns the a resource id set for the property. *

If the property is not of a resource id type, returns {@code 0}.

methods.name: public boolean isResourceId()
methods.comment: * Returns {@code true} if the property is a resource id type. Otherwise {@code false}.

methods.name: public String getString()
methods.comment:
* Returns the a String value set for the property. *

If the property is not a String type, returns {@code null}.

methods.name: public boolean isString()
methods.comment: * Returns {@code true} if the property is a String type. Otherwise {@code false}.

methods.name: public Bundle toBundle(Bundle outBundle)
methods.comment:
* Adds a mapping from the given key to this property's value in the provided
         * {@link android.os.Bundle}. If the provided {@link android.os.Bundle} is
         * {@code null}, creates a new {@link android.os.Bundle}.
         * @hide

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
